text: Posting in here because "wearables" is also about what you do with all that data you captured. <http://aprilzero.com/>

attachments.text: Anand Sharma's quantified self tracking system with realtime location, physical activity, travel history, photos, pulse, weight, blood levels and more.

text: I'm a bit mad/sad because I've been working on something very similar (even using the same font) for the last month and will probably have to "pivot" now.
If you don't follow Gemma Correll's comic work you should: <https://twitter.com/gemmacorrell/status/489712755147304960>

text: also for fun, i'm wearing this samsung galaxy gear today to see what's up. so far, it's huge and clunky and because there's no SIM in this android i have, i can't make fancy phone calls with my wrist
<@U026103R3> could you start a hangout or something?
i don't think so? i will try
nah, the "apps" on this thing are very minimal and pretty lame
also because samsung and google aren't truly friends, i doubt they'd make it super easy to start a hangout
it's not like you can surf the internet with this thing either so there's no way that i can see to start one
